cause.description:
Across Seattle, hundreds of kids aren't getting high right now. We aim to remedy that. Our only goal is to raise money to buy drugs, so we can help the youths of Seattle get high as hell.
1. Smoking Weed is awesome.
2. We need money to buy drugs.
3. Abe Bae needs to get high.
cause.name: Blunt Sesh 07
